# Rest

<div class="type-hierarchy"><strong>haxe.extern.Rest</strong> (Typedef)</div>

DEPRECATED: use haxe.Rest instead.

A special type that represents "rest" function argument.
Should be used as a type for the last argument of an extern method,
representing that arbitrary number of arguments of given type can be
passed to that method.

<div class="see"><strong>See:</strong> <https://haxe.org/manual/lf-externs.html></div>


## Metadata

| Name | Parameters |
|------|------------|
| `:nativeGen` | - |
